main event: A bright object was sighted in the Orlando, Florida area on November 15, 1963, which was first observed at a high altitude in an elliptical path before descending and displaying unusual characteristics.
interesting points: The object was observed to have a bright color, possibly red, with flashing lights around its edges., The object was estimated to be much larger than a conventional aircraft., It remained stationary for several minutes before moving erratically at a rapid speed., Three different observers reported the sighting within a short period of time., The conclusion was that it was probably an aircraft, although its unusual movements and characteristics made this inconclusive.
sighted object: one bright object in the sky
witness description: three different observers reported the sighting
